name: Pub Crawlers (Team Dracion)
description:
Pub Crawlers is a point and click puzzle game where you play a bouncer who has the responsibility to check and ID a diverse selection of people entering your local pub. As a bouncer you need to refuse entry to people coming in with fake ID's, under age,  acting drunk and disorderly or even people that are on the banned list. There is a lot of different information to keep track of so if you make mistakes, your boss will fire you!

Instructions:

  1. Download Game
  2. Run Pub Crawler.exe
  3. Enjoy!
